messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: Put decent and reliable health and social care at the top of the agenda. Campaign to retain the national triple lock to guarantee pension increases. Promote equality in State Education funding to provide better opportunities for all our children. Campaign for increased funding for all our schools. Support new businesses and provide advice and grants for them. Invest in Our Public Services: NHS and police force to increase their performance and safety.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Put decent and reliable health and social care at the top of the agenda.

Promote equality in State Education funding to provide better opportunities for all our children. Campaign for increased funding for all our schools.
Support new businesses and provide advice and grants for them.
Invest in Our Public Services: NHS and police force to increase their performance and safety.

leaflet.personalStatement: Vernon always stands up for us. He is a proven and experienced candidate and insists on fighting for our best interests.

politicalExperience.achievements: Insists on fighting for local interests and getting results for the community.
